node.excerpt: Gatsby is great for not only static sites but also traditional web applications. You can add authentication and serverless functionality and get up and running incredibly quickly with Netlify - here's how.

frontmatter.title: Turning the Static Dynamic: Gatsby + Netlify Functions + Netlify Identity
